entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DisplayActionSheet crashes on MacCatalyst #23288
  • CollectionView does not appear to reuse Templated controls #23285
  • Android: PanGestureRecognizer gets confused when changing ZIndex after the pan starts. #23284
  • Simulator server fail when running on alternative xcode path #23283
  • iOS CarouselView crashes with "MauiContext should have been set on parent." #23278
    .NET 8 SR7
  • IsOSPlatform(OSPlatform.OSX) returns false when using MAUI on Mac (MacCatalyst) #23277
  • Cannot load SVG image resources on iOS #23275
  • Add a MeasureUpdated event and look at deprecating SizeChanged for LayoutUpdated #23274
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Blazor Hybrid] `UseMaui` in Razor Class Library breaks wwwroot paths #23270
  • Copy font assets only works at second build #23268
  • SetCornerRadius of GradientDrawable doesn't work anymore #23267
    .NET 8 SR7

Closed

  • CollectionView does not update column when changing ItemsLayout span #23266
  • [iOS] Cannot create archive due to the "Unzip" task failing with System.NotSupportedException because the app package content includes the link to local drive #22359
    Backlog
  • iOS/Mac Catalyst image localization #16734
    Backlog
  • Settings.bundle/Root.plist doesn't get included in iOS bundle. Maui.Storage.Preferences has no methods to save "shared" settings into device settings. #9122
    Under Consideration
  • BundleResource by default include to a nested directory, which can be confusing #8612
    Under Consideration
  • iOS: the Link metadata on automatically included items is incorrect #7692
    Backlog
  • Hot Restart Bug On "Select a Team" Drop Down #19929
  • issue running tutorial #21869
  • JavaPlatformJarPath Error #19387
  • [regression/8.0.3] Android Target Framework and Minimum Android Target Framework list are empty #19150
  • Unable to hit debug point in C# Library from Android MAUI .NET7 App #21323
  • Maui .Net 8 iOS MediaPicker.CapturePhotoAsync issue returns null after user presses USE PHOTO on apple device #23254
  • net8 MainPage.xaml Button problem Clicked = "OnClickButton5" does not work!!!<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <ContentPage xmlns="http://sch #23253
  • [iOS} Crashed: tid_103 EXC_BAD_ACCESS KERN_INVALID_ADDRESS 0x0000000000000000 #23235
  • Can't find any video content illustrating how to add a Google Map in a Blazor Hybrid Mobile Application can anyone provide links #23258
  • Throwing in a background thread freezes the UI when debugging a MAUI app #23261
  • [Android] System.ObjectDisposedException: ObjectDisposed_StreamClosed #21461

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] Null terminate iOS TabbedRenderer #23290
  • Null terminate iOS TabbedRenderer #23289
  • [tests] Analyzer / code fix provider for UITest [Test] without [Category] #23287
  • [windows] fix memory leak in `TabbedPage` #23281
    memory-leak 💦
  • Generate the Android 7 round app icon #23276
  • [X] Dont SetBinding for values returned by OnIdiom #23272
  • Android ecosystem updates based on net9.0 branch #23271
  • [Windows] Make sure that `FileSystem.Current.AppDataDirectory` folder exists in unpackaged #23265
    community ✨

Merged

  • Update bug-report.yml with 8.0.61 #23273
  • Split SingleProject targets #23269
    area-single-project
  • Move tests to new location #23251

Updated

  • Obsolete Frame for NET9 in favor of Border #23184
    t/docs 📝, area-controls-frame
  • Re-Enable CA1416 #20477
    area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • Add Apple Privacy Manifest to new project template #21350
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-templates
  • NavigationBar properties not updating - fix #23076
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • Support the new RIDs on WinUI #23247
  • Enable RefreshView Tests #23181
    area-testing
  • Do not include Maui.InTree.targets for an AspNet.Core project #23246
  • [Android] Ecosystem updates WAS:Google Maps bump/update #20783
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-map
  • [Android] Avoid double event subscribes in gesture manager #23242
  • Add possibility to run UI tests per category (or any filter) #22609
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-infrastructure
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
